name: Revelation
text: You gain a brief understanding of the workings of a single puzzle, device, or trap, gaining an insight bonus equal to your caster level (maximum +10) on checks to disable, manipulate or solve the object in question. Your insight is ineffable; you are unable to communicate your understanding to others. At the GM's option, this spell may instead give you a clue or other piece of useful information. In this case you may communicate the clue to others and retain knowledge of it after the spell's duration has expired.
text_zh: 你获得一道谜题、一件装置或一个陷阱一段它们运作机制的简要领会，这让你在解除、操纵或解决这可疑物体的检定上，获得等于你施法者等级的洞察加值(最多+10)。这股内化是无法言喻的。你无法与他人分享你的领会。在GM的选择下，这法术可以转而给予你一条线索或著其他一部分有用的资讯。在这种情况下，你可以与他人讨论这条线索，并且在此法术持续时间结束后，仍然保留此知识。
